member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2.GetDimension
member.summary: Gets the number of dimensions in which the animation variable has a transition specified.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2.GetDuration
member.summary: Gets the duration of the transition.
member.param: The duration of the transition, in seconds.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2.IsDurationKnown
member.summary: Determines whether the duration of a transition is known.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2.SetInitialValue
member.summary: Sets the initial value of the transition.
member.param: The initial value for the transition.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2.SetInitialVectorValue
member.summary: Sets the initial value of the transition for each specified dimension in the animation variable.
member.param: A vector (of size cDimension) that contains the initial values for the transition.
The number of dimensions that require transition values. This parameter specifies the number of values listed in value.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2.SetInitialVectorVelocity
member.summary: Sets the initial velocity of the transition for each specified dimension in the animation variable.
member.param: A vector (of size cDimension) that contains the initial velocities for the transition.
The number of dimensions that require transition velocities. This parameter specifies the number of values listed in velocity.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2.SetInitialVelocity
member.summary: Sets the initial velocity of the transition.
member.param: The initial velocity for the transition.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTransition2
member.summary: Extends the interface that defines a transition. An IUIAnimationTransition2 transition determines how an animation variable changes over time in a given dimension.
